      • incrementReadyCount

        public void incrementReadyCount()
        We do not allow direct modification of the readyCount. A player can only click on 'Ready' but not 'unclick' it. This will simply increment the current readyCount It will not perform any validation!

      • decrementReadyCount

        public void decrementReadyCount()
        We do not allow direct modification of the readyCount. A player can only click on 'Ready' but not 'unclick' it, but it can be decreased because of an UserRemove message. This will simply decrement the current readyCount It will not perform any validation!

      • getReadyCount

        public int getReadyCount()
        Returns the current readyCount
        Returns:
        The amount of players ready to play

      • getGameTimeInMinutes

        public int getGameTimeInMinutes()

        Returns the game time in minutes. If the game already started only every full 60 seconds will be counted.

        Example:
        4 minutes 36 seconds -> return value: 4
        5 minutes 0 seconds -> return value 5

        Returns:
        the game time in minutes

      • getGameTimeInSeconds

        public long getGameTimeInSeconds()
        Returns:
        the gameTime in seconds

        Parameters:
        gameTime - the gameTime to set in minutes

        public int getRoundCount()
        Returns the amount of rounds played.
        Returns:
        the roundCount

      • roundFinished

        public void roundFinished()

        Increases the counter for rounds already played.

        This does NOT send any message to a client.

        Parameters:
        roundCount - the roundCount to set

      • roundStart

        public void roundStart()

        Starts a new round. Schedules a TimerTask every second to decrease game time.

        This does NOT send any message to a client.

      • isReadyToStart

        public boolean isReadyToStart()
        Checks if a level and a game time are selected by the game admin.
        Returns:
        true when both are selected, else false
